Author: abstractbill
Title: Sending xhtml as text/html considered harmful

Author: nostrademons
Content: The prequel "Built to Last", however, is great for startups.  He studied "visionary companies" in that one (including HP, IBM, Merck, 3M, etc.), and includes a lot about *how* a visionary company starts.  I heard echoes of Built to Last in Woz's presentation at the startup school, so it's not just old-economy companies that it applies to.
